name: πολυγαμία
description:
polygamy, or precisely polygyny (only for men), a classic disturbing material endlessly used in our local comedy shows,

this medieval practice is no laughing matter when it actually causes pain to women (and children), 

even back when i was a believer (really faithful spiritually), i couldn’t find a single reason to justify why the fuck this is permissible, 

i myself witnessed how this crap affects people, i used to stay with my grandmother who unwillingly had to share her husband with another woman, my grandfather married his second wife way before i was born,

every other night, she had to be alone at home, and that’s when i would hear her sleep-talking, sometimes shouting, subconsciously praying out loud, i would hear words such as “god, send me your angels to take my life away”, “that bitch”, “idiot imam” (yes he is an imam, leading prayers in mosques, of course) and things like that,

sometimes i really wish her life just could end so she doesn’t have to bear this pain anymore, she’s super depressed and it caused her mild-dementia, every time i manage to make her smile, it’s so precious, but i can’t always be there for her,

it’s an outdated misogynistic practice, wasn’t okay back then, still not okay now, no exceptions and i long for the day to see it be put to an end.
